abstract: The Senate will reopen as a court of impeachment Wednesday afternoon, when the House impeachment managers are expected to give opening arguments.
lead_paragraph: Over twelve hours after the Senate opened as a trial of impeachment, Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky adjourned the chamber for the evening, drawing a day of rancorous debate to a close. The Senate will reopen as a court of impeachment Wednesday afternoon, when senators are expected to hear opening arguments from the House impeachment managers.
